Sheila Resseger: a retired teacher, mentioned the 60,000 figure in a Providence Journal commentary critical of standardized testing.
The 60: 000 figure was also included in a flier put out by NYS Allies for Public Education, a New York state group that opposes Common Core testing.
Volunteers: including a mother named Gross, obtained figures from about half of New York state's 698 districts on the number of students opting out of each test, confirming a significant number of students boycotted the tests.
